# Let's RMarkdown

## Prerequisites
- RStudio
- RMarkdown
```{r}
install.packages("rmarkdown")
```
- knitr
```{r}
install.packages("knitr")
```

## Structure 
![structure](/slide/slide_files/structure.png){width=80% height=80%}

### 1. Metadata in the Header (YAML)
---
title: "Let's RMarkdown"
author: "su so"
date: "2018-10-04"
output: html_document
---

### 2. Code chunk 
- keyboard shortcut: option + command + I
```{r}
x <- 1 + 1
```
